Hero.title: Professional Nursing Service, in the Comfort of Your Home
Hero.subtitle: VERA Nurses is a next-generation digital health platform that connects individuals in need of care with expert, certified, and vetted nurses, caregivers, and health professionals. We are not a hospital or a clinic; we are a technology organization that manages the process and finds the right health professional for you through our contracted institutions.

AboutSection.title: A Pioneering Approach in Digital Health Services
AboutSection.intro: VERA Nurses, together with VERA Doctors, is a member of VERA Premium Care Health Services Inc. We ensure you always have access to effective, efficient, and trust-based health services with an expert staff pioneering in remote and digital health services.
AboutSection.mission: With virtual hospital concepts and remote health services, we reduce the crowded patient load of hospitals and save time for our patients.
AboutSection.badgeText: Our services are provided and audited under the assurance of VERA Nurses Quality and Standards.

Hero.title: Bringing the Future of Health to the Comfort of Your Home.
Hero.subtitle: VERA Nurses is a world-class health ecosystem that combines medical excellence with compassionate care.

Story.title: Excellence Is Not a Coincidence, It Is a Choice.
Story.p1: When we set out, we had a single goal: To take healthcare out of cold hospital corridors and bring it to the place where people feel most at peace—their home. However, while doing so, never compromising on hospital standards.
Story.p2: Today, under the umbrella of VERA Premium Care, we blend the power of technology with the human touch. For every patient, we are not just a healthcare provider, but a trusted member of the family and the most loyal companion on the journey to recovery.
Story.quote: For us, health is not just about getting better; it is about feeling safe and valued throughout the process.

supportBox.title: 24/7 Professional Support
supportBox.desc: We are by your side at any moment with our expert staff.

nurse.title: Home Nursing Services
nurse.subtitle: All your medical procedures are performed in the comfort of your home by our professional nurses, without the need to go to the hospital.
nurse.description: We offer all nursing services such as injections, IV therapy, wound dressing, catheter insertion/removal, and blood drawing at your home with our expert staff certified and approved by the Ministry of Health. We accelerate your recovery process with procedures performed under hygienic conditions and in accordance with doctor's directives.

escort.title: Patient Companionship Services
escort.subtitle: Your loved ones are in safe hands. Professional companionship support at the hospital or at home.
escort.description: We are by your side with our trained companions who will accompany your patient, perform self-care tasks, and manage medication tracking during hospital processes or home care. We alleviate the burden on your family with both short-term (hourly) and long-term (live-in) companionship services.

elderly.title: Elderly Care
elderly.subtitle: We offer a comfortable aging process to our elders with the respect and care they deserve.
elderly.description: Our care staff, experienced in geriatrics, support elderly individuals in their daily living activities while also attending to their social and psychological needs. We have specially trained personnel for patients with specific conditions such as Alzheimer's, Dementia, or Parkinson's.

birth.title: Pregnancy & Birth Support
birth.subtitle: We are with the mother and baby during the most miraculous moments of life.
birth.description: We provide support with our professional midwives and nurses throughout the entire process, from prenatal preparation training to postpartum lactation consulting and baby care. While accelerating the mother's recovery process, we ensure the baby gets a healthy start to life.

physio.title: Home Physiotherapy
physio.subtitle: Regain your freedom of movement. Treatment at home with expert physiotherapists.
physio.description: For rehabilitation after orthopedic surgeries, neurological diseases (stroke, paralysis), or age-related mobility restrictions, our expert physiotherapists come to your home with personalized treatment programs. We support your recovery with modern equipment and manual therapy methods.

ambulance.title: Vera Air Clinic & Ambulance
ambulance.subtitle: We are racing against time. We are all over the world with our ground and air ambulance services.
ambulance.description: We are at your service with our fully equipped ground and air ambulances, from emergency transport to intercity or international patient transfers. We ensure safe transfer with our intensive care equipped vehicles and expert paramedic teams.
